put.summary: Create or update an API Key for the Nginx deployment in order to access the dataplane API endpoint

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The API Key object containing fields (e.g. secret text, expiration date) to upsert the key.

200.description: The API Key was successfully updated and returned.

201.description: The API Key was successfully created and returned.

delete.summary: Delete API key for Nginx deployment

204.description: The API key resource does not exist.

200.description: The API key was successfully deleted.

get.summary: Get the specified API Key of the given Nginx deployment

200.description: Successfully retrieved the API Key

get.summary: List all API Keys of the given Nginx deployment

200.description: Successfully listed the Deployment's API Keys

get.summary: Get a certificate of given NGINX deployment

200.description: Successfully retrieved the Certificate

put.summary: Create or update the NGINX certificates for given NGINX deployment

200.description: Successfully Created or Updated the Certificate

delete.summary: Deletes a certificate from the NGINX deployment

get.summary: List all certificates of given NGINX deployment

200.description: Successfully listed the deployment's certificates

get.summary: List the NGINX configuration of given NGINX deployment.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the deployment's configurations

get.summary: Get the NGINX configuration of given NGINX deployment

200.description: Successfully retrieved the deployment's configuration

put.summary: Create or update the NGINX configuration for given NGINX deployment

200.description: Successfully Created or Updated the configuration

delete.summary: Reset the NGINX configuration of given NGINX deployment to default

post.summary: Analyze an NGINX configuration without applying it to the NGINXaaS deployment

200.description: Successfully completed configuration analysis
Successfully retrieved the deployment

put.summary: Create or update the NGINX deployment

200.description: Successfully Created or Updated the deployment
Deployment PATCH successful
Successfully listed all deployments under the subscription

get.summary: List all NGINX deployments under the specified resource group.

200.description: Successfully listed all deployments under the resource group

get.summary: Get the Nginx Waf Policy of given Nginx deployment

200.description: Successfully retrieved the custom Waf Policy

put.summary: Create or update the Nginx Waf Policy for given Nginx deployment

200.description: Successfully Created or Updated the custom Waf Policy

201.description: Custom Waf Policy upsert accepted for provisioning

Retry-After.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying or until the operation is likely to complete

Operation-Location.description: The URL to poll for the status of this asynchronous operation

delete.summary: Reset the Nginx Waf Policy of given Nginx deployment to default

Retry-After.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying or until the operation is likely to complete

Operation-Location.description: The URL to poll for the status of this asynchronous operation

204.description: Successfully deleted the custom Waf Policy

200.description: Successfully listed the deployment's default Waf policies

capacity.description: The capacity parameters of the profile.

min.description: The minimum number of NCUs the deployment can be autoscaled to.

max.description: The maximum number of NCUs the deployment can be autoscaled to.

content.description: The content of the protected file. This value is a PUT only value. If you perform a GET request on this value, it will be empty because it is a protected file.

virtualPath.description: The virtual path of the protected file.

contentHash.description: The hash of the content of the file. This value is used to determine if the file has changed.

virtualPath.description: The virtual path of the protected file.

contentHash.description: The hash of the content of the file. This value is used to determine if the file has changed.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

NginxDeploymentScalingProperties.description: Information on how the deployment will be scaled.

autoScaleSettings.description: The settings for enabling automatic scaling of the deployment. If this field is specified, 'scale.capacity' must be empty.

preferredEmail.description: The preferred support contact email address of the user used for sending alerts and notification. Can be an empty string or a valid email address.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the deployment.

dataplaneApiEndpoint.description: Dataplane API endpoint for the caller to update the NGINX state of the deployment.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

nginxAppProtect.description: Update settings for NGINX App Protect (NAP)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

NginxDeploymentApiKeyRequestProperties.title: Nginx Deployment Api Key Request Properties

secretText.description: Secret text to be used as a Dataplane API Key. This is a write only property that can never be read back, but the first three characters will be returned in the 'hint' property.

endDateTime.description: The time after which this Dataplane API Key is no longer valid.

NginxDeploymentApiKeyResponseProperties.title: Nginx Deployment Api Key Response Properties

hint.description: The first three characters of the secret text to help identify it in use. This property is read-only.

endDateTime.description: The time after which this Dataplane API Key is no longer valid.

NginxDeploymentApiKeyListResponse.title: Nginx Deployment Api Key List Response

OperationDisplay.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Type on which the operation is performed, e.g., 'deployments'.

operation.description: Operation type, e.g., read, write, delete, etc.

description.description: Description of the operation, e.g., 'Write deployments'.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

OperationListResult.description: Result of GET request to list Nginx.NginxPlus operations.

value.description: List of operations supported by the Nginx.NginxPlus provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

AnalysisCreate.description: The request body for creating an analysis for an NGINX configuration.

rootFile.description: The root file of the NGINX config file(s). It must match one of the files' filepath.

AnalysisResult.description: The response body for an analysis request. Contains the status of the analysis and any errors.

AnalysisDiagnostic.description: An error object found during the analysis of an NGINX configuration.

description.example: Directives outside the http context are not allowed

file.description: the filepath of the most relevant config file

message.example: You are not allowed to set the worker_processes directive

DiagnosticItem.description: A diagnostic is a message associated with an NGINX config. The Analyzer returns diagnostics with a level indicating the importance of the diagnostic with optional category.

description.example: Some directives cannot be overridden by the user provided configuration.

file.description: The filepath of the most relevant config file.

message.example: The value will be overridden with `4000`.

category.description: Category of warning like Best-practices, Recommendation, Security etc.

WebApplicationFirewallSettings.description: Settings for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF)

activationState.description: The activation state of the WAF. Use 'Enabled' to enable the WAF and 'Disabled' to disable it.

WebApplicationFirewallStatus.description: The status of the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall

wafRelease.description: NGINX App Protect WAF release version

attackSignaturesPackage.description: Package containing attack signatures for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF).

botSignaturesPackage.description: Package containing bot signatures for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF).

threatCampaignsPackage.description: Package containing threat campaigns for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF).

componentVersions.description: Versions of the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF) components.

WebApplicationFirewallPackage.description: NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF) Package. Contains the version and revision date of the package.

version.description: The version of the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF) package.

revisionDatetime.description: The date and time of the package revision.

WebApplicationFirewallComponentVersions.description: Versions of the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF) components.

wafEngineVersion.description: The version of the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF) engine.

wafNginxVersion.description: The version of the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF) module for NGINX.

NginxDeploymentWafPolicyApplyingStatus.title: Nginx Deployment Waf Policy Applying Status

displayStatus.description: A readable string of the current status, and sometimes have the reason for the current state.

time.description: The date and time in UTC the current applying status was set.

NginxDeploymentWafPolicyApplyingStatusCo.description: Machine readable code indicating the applying status code of a WAF Policy.

values.description: The policy is not referenced in the nginx config and not applied.
The policy is referenced in the nginx config and is applying.
The policy is referenced in the nginx config and that config has been successfully applied.
The policy is referenced in the nginx config and that config failed to apply.
The policy is now not referenced in the nginx config and its being removed from the applied nginx config.

NginxDeploymentWafPolicyCompilingStatus.title: Nginx Deployment Waf Policy Compiling Status

displayStatus.description: A readable string of the current status, and sometimes have the reason for the current state. If the CompilingStatus is Failed the Display Status will be The waf Policy failed to compile.

time.description: The date and time the policy was compiled in UTC.

NginxDeploymentWafPolicyCompilingStatusC.description: Machine readable code indicating the compilation status of a WAF Policy.

values.description: The compilation of the custom waf policy has not started
The compilation of the custom waf policy is in progress
The compilation of the custom waf policy is completed successfully and can now be referenced in the nginx config.
The compilation of the custom waf policy failed.

content.description: The byte content of the Policy

filepath.description: The file path where the Policy is to be saved
